summary: Implemented a new Images/Gallery screen with a responsive grid and image preview dialog, and added navigation to reach it via BottomNav/App section routing. However, the diff does not show the 8 image files being added as static frontend assets, and there are additional unrelated style/branding/config changes indicated in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the 8 user-uploaded images as static frontend assets and reference them by filename in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the expected filenames via '/assets/gallery/â€¦', but the diff summary does not show any image files (or public asset additions) being added to the repository, so it cannot be confirmed that the images exist as static assets and will load in production builds.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling/theme changes (index.css OKLCH color system, safe-area utilities) and Tailwind configuration extensions (fonts, shadows, animations).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; only requested adding an in-app image gallery using static assets, navigation, and preview behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Branding/logo updates in Header and Home screen ("new v2 logo via branding constants") and additional logout/query-cache behavior mentioned.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; unrelated to the gallery feature set.
